article: the special u.s. envoy tasked with jump-starting flagging peace talks between israel and the palestinians will huddle thursday with prime minister-designate benjamin netanyahu , a vocal opponent of the negotiations .
abstract: us envoy netanyahu to huddle on peace efforts
